document.full_text: a natural gas company has suspended a drilling technique involving chemical-laced water at its pennsylvania wells until it determines the cause of a spill in the northern part of the state.
document.title: mid-atlantic : pennsylvania: drilling technique suspended after spill
lines_and_colors: a natural gas company has suspended a drilling technique involving chemical-laced water at its pennsylvania wells until it determines the cause of a spill in the northern part of the state.
